document_data.image: Lake of the Snake and Lake of Snows.png
document_data.name: Lake of the Snake
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lake of the Snake''' was a small lake in the [[Dragon Coast]].  The lake was south of the [[Horse Prairie]] and east of the [[Giant's Run]] mountains.  The river [[Reddan]] fed the lake.  The town of [[Wyrm's Hamlet]] sat on the northern shore.
